title: What are 3 word problems involving rational function, equation, inequalities about areas of your rice fields, population in your place, demand and supplies of agricultural? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yikes! You’ll learn more trying to formulate an answer to this problem than just fishing for a completed solution.That’s true of most ANY problem in Maths or CS and probably Physic too … in my opinion. Enjoy!
